long_description: The prAna Audrey pants hug your hips and will keep you motivated to advance your yoga or Pilates practice. Stay cool with moisture-wicking nylon and spandex blend; 4-way stretch encourages full range of motion. Elastic waist offers comfortable fit; gusset adds extra element of stretch for bending and twisting. Made with prAna Chakara performance fabric, the Audrey pants are designed to feel as soft and natural as cotton while retaining the performance benefits of synthetics.
short_description: The prAna Audrey pants hug your hips and will keep you motivated to advance your yoga or Pilates practice.
